intro: Hiraea swarziana, commonly known as the Swarzian hiraea, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have a glossy green surface. The flowers are small, clustered in inflorescences, and are usually white or pale pink in color.
